data.name: Catapult
data.description:
Catapult and makeSEA.com allow you to share and collaborate live using content you produce. You can mix many sources, at any scale, and save every collaboration space layout for future recall. 

Sharing and collaborating is as easy as:
1.  Create a Project at makeSEA.com
2.  Save any 3D content from your favorite 3D creative tool in GLB, STL, OBJ, or FBX or MP4 (video), or other compatible format to your Project's Assets collection
3.  Add Team Members if you like,  and set your preferred sharing mode: Private, Public, etc. (!IMPORTANT Team members cannot see assets in Draft mode).
4.  Launch Catapult (this application), login with your makeSEA credentials, and choose a Project to join the Project’s collaboration space. Note that only Team Members can join Projects marked Private.

For detailed instructions and release notes please see http://www.makesea.com/how-to

changelog.change_log: This release includes passthrough support for XR experiences, performance and stability optimizations, and support for Quest 3.
This release fixes an issue with the video player playing bookshelf assets correctly.
This release fixes an issue with videos stepping on each other while playing simultaneously.

Release 4.0i "Featurelicous" - The Best Catapult App Yet!
New in this release:
Meta Avatar 2.0 Support
Gateways for linking Project spaces together
Savable Video Placement
Realtime Greeen-screen/Chromakey Video Playback (Human Avatars)
In-experience Onboarding and Help Support with Dynamic Updates

New in this release:
Fixes issue with exploding assets across device platforms originating from Oculus perspective.
Minor usability enhancements.
Please be sure your peers update to this version for compatibility when collaborating.

Fixes issue with some Guest users connecting with Mic off by default.
New improved collaboration security and performance.
!! Please be sure your peers update to this version for compatibility when collaborating.

This release includes:
Guest Login Support
Follow Me (to unlisted spaces)
New Experimental Mode: Bookshelf Follow-Me
Improved scene navigation “Jetpack Mode” added:  hold down secondary triggers and use thumbsticks to navigate spaces in addition to standard Oculus navigation controls
This release includes support for PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint Files, and shared whiteboards in each makeSEA Project space.  Go make something and share your vision with the world!
